name: Melody (itch) (gubebra)
description:
Game made for the one hour game jam #4 (https://itch.io/jam/one-hour-of-the-week-jam-4). Theme: Quick

Finish te game before the music ends! 1 minute

Controls:

  • Left/Right arrow - Move
  • Up arrow - Jump

Made by:

  • gubebra (https://gubebra.itch.io/)

Art:

https://0x72.itch.io/8x8-f24-tileset

I thought I could do more levels and add more fun,  but it was too hard for me to make this game in one hour, maybe I will work on it for the future! I am happy with the result, I think.  Hope you enjoy!
